content.raw:
FYI this appears to be fixed in GMTK 1.1.1. Segway train jobs with `--resolution` set don't segfault under GMTK 1.1.1.

I can't 100% confirm right now because some of the tests are failing on my OS X system (seems to be an issue with slight changes with precision that cause some of the `diff` comparisons to fail).
content.html:
FYI this appears to be fixed in GMTK 1.1.1. Segway train jobs with --resolution set don't segfault under GMTK 1.1.1.
